website_summaries.verdict: The LCD touch display and MABUCHI silent motors make this a high-performing watch winder.
pros: The handmade wooden case and acrylic window give this case a classy look, and the two watch pillows hold larger watches well
The winder has multiple programming options and is powered with the included AC adapter
cons: The winder stops sporadically, according to some customers

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working After One Month!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product October 2 and it stopped working this weekend on November 11. The unit powers up but the motors don't work anymore. UPDATE: Changing review since they have phenomenal customer service. They did their best to ship me a replacement unit.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Durden

customer_reviews.title: Great winder value, but a little noisy
customer_reviews.text: After one week of usage: Looks fantastic, if anything the online pics do NOT do it justice. Great finish. Love the LCD controls, easy to setup and use. My only MINOR issue, it is a "little" noisy when running. I have this about 10 feet from my bed and it is noticeable. If it stays like this- all is good, IF it gets more noisy not good. So if you are a light sleeper and plan to have this in the bedroom, you may need to consider another choice. My previous Heiden was whisper quiet until the motor gave up.
customer_reviews.author: WileyK

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy This Noisy Watch Winder!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this watch winder because one of the reviews was so specific about how quite it was. That review listed decibel readings and other scientific measurements to describe the quiet performance. A few months ago the winder started making noise when it came on. It is now getting noisier and noisier. It is much too noisy to have in the bedroom anymore. I'd stay away from this product.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: 2nd time. Still a miss!
customer_reviews.text: This is disappointing. The first delivery was with lose screws. As pointed here, i went to tighten it. Afterwards, the box won't close properly so i refunded it. Here we are now at the second winder, looks good but the problem is the controls are inverted. Motor 2 is showing as line 1 and vice versa? Let's see what's the seller response. Otherwise, I'll be returning this for the second time. The product looks really nice though. Their QC is just out of control. Update 6/28/2017 After a 3rd try. The product looks perfect. As described and does not over wind the watch with pre defined tpd settings. Silent enough for me to put it beside my bed.
customer_reviews.author: cJx

customer_reviews.title: Looks very nice. Doesn't do what it should...
customer_reviews.text: Don't expect a watch winder to... you know... WIND YOUR WATCH! If you're hoping, as I was, to put your dead watches on this thing the night before you plan on wearing them, because you have an SKX or similar that won't manually wind, then you are out of luck. Apparently, a watch maintainer, as they should be called, will only keep a watch running after you've manually wound it. What a useless and expensive contraption. I guess us non-manual winding owners must continue to get strange looks as we shake our watches around for minutes at a time like we're insane.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but doesnt work
customer_reviews.text: First off this is a beautiful machine. Trouble is it doesn't work! I returned the first one, no problem. Second one didn't work at all. Customer service for Chiyoda is useless unless you're multi-lingual. The instructions it came with are marginal at best. The only good thing about this transaction was UPS and Amazon customer service. Look elsewhere for a decent watch winder!
customer_reviews.author: Robert N.

customer_reviews.title: Nice but a bit loud. Had issue but it was promptly resolved.  Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Additional update - I was sent a replacement unit a little while back and it has been flawless. I appreciate the excellent customer service! Update to my previous review - it only lasted 4 months and then it stopped working. The unit powers up and everything works except for the motors - so it doesn't wind the watches. Which makes it pretty useless! Hopefully I can get it replaced and update this review depending on the customer service / return aspect. This is a great looking unit, but it grinds and growls all night and can definitely be distracting. Works perfectly just not very quiet.
customer_reviews.author: A. Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Great quality at a fantastic value!!
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit skeptical in ordering this, as my other winder was 5 times the price. When it arrived I immediately thought it's expensive/elegant looking, and has held up so far. The finish fits very nicely in my closet, and doesn't look out of place. I have a small wrist so the fact that I can adjust the watch pillow is everything, no more squishing my watch onto an oversized pillow. The motor is so pretty quiet and barely noticeable. Very impressed so far and no regrets with this.
customer_reviews.author: CitiBuilder

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: First impressions - ss far as I can tell; no neodymium magnets in the case and it seems to work alright. As others have mentioned, it’s no where close to quiet (the diplomat is quieter) and the finish goes from nice to blemishes (mine has clear spots a larger than a quarter - where the finish rubbed off during transit). It’s too much of a hassle to return, but just be aware of what you’re getting.
customer_reviews.author: eShopping

customer_reviews.title: Beuatiful Box!
customer_reviews.text: It is truly a piece of art! Beautiful craftsmanship! I have 3 automatic watchs, and handles all three nicely. The largest being my Invicta Mickey Mouse and my slim Tag. Cradles them both quite nicely. It is simple to set up and quiet as can be! I've been following manufacturer's suggestion of shutting it down every couple of weeks to help with longevity and durability of the motors. Time will tell on this, I've only had the box for a couple of months now.
customer_reviews.author: MacLeod

customer_reviews.title: Setup was super easy. Our Rolex watches were easy to put ...
customer_reviews.text: Received two days ago. Outside looks well made and polished. Well packed and had an operating instruction sheet enclosed. Setup was super easy. Our Rolex watches were easy to put into the pillows. Only used the 650TPD setting. Motors are pretty quiet. Seems to be working well, though I do not see it turning as often. I am pleased with the purchase so far. A little pricey but if it lasts then it will have been worth it. My other watch winders lasted only a few months, so I was very concerned that I buy something of higher quality. I will monitor how this works and will post later if there are any issues with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't restart after power failure
customer_reviews.text: With even a momentary power failure. The system resets to off. If you are gone for a couple of days, you come home to a dead watch. Recommend plugging this in to a small UPS
customer_reviews.author: Aileron

customer_reviews.title: Attractive unit with some noise issues
customer_reviews.text: Very attractive unit. Directions are somewhat vague, but can be easily figured out. You can specify which on of the programs is specific to your watch this holds for both bands. I would give this unit 5 stars except that it has developed a grinding noise within the last couple of weeks. Initially it was silent. Now it is beginning to bother me as it is on my night stand. But for that, it is a very nice piece of equipment. However, customer service immediately cleared up the problem with a new upgraded unit
customer_reviews.author: william wenerowicz

customer_reviews.title: Not reliable.
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed! This winder constantly resets so I will go and get a new watch and they will not have been wound. I am constantly keeping an eye on it to make sure it occasionally turns....I have no reliance in it to work. Was a waste of money and would encourage folks to look at a different brand or one without electronic controls
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: An Excellent, Good Looking Winder
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for a little more than a week, but it is an excellent winder. The case is beautifully finished wood. It has 4 turns per day options and 3 direction options which should work with any automatic watch. The intermittent wind/rest/wind program, I believe, prevents overworking the watch's mechanism. I also like the touch controls to set the winding options. The bar lights up when touched and you can set the TPD, Winding Direction, and on off for each watch individually. It is well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Hartner

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: For what you get - for what you paid, this winder is a GREAT value. The craftsmanship is very good. One suggestion is to make a more expensive model of the winder using some type of hardwood. The pine wood used for the existing model makes for an economical pricepoint, however many customers would pay a little bit more for hardwood. Highly recommended purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tace Der

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This was a fathers Day gift for my fiancée...he has mentioned several times in passing that he needs something like this so I figured I would try my luck that it would be a good gift. Holy Cow! He LOVES it. he not only found it incredibly thoughtful, he loves the machine itself. It is quiet, stylish and perfect. We are both very happy...and Amazon Prime got it to me in one day...yowza....happy customer indeed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very well made
customer_reviews.text: Day 3 review. Very well made. Cabinet is near perfect: fit, finish, hinges, plastic window and a bonus lock. Even the area where the cord plugs into the back is well made - it has a brass reinforcing plate. The power cord is even well made aand of a thicker guage than normal. Inside is the same quality as the outside. It is by my bed and it is so quiet, I haven't heard it turn on yet. The unit is meticulously made.
customer_reviews.author: G. Crinnion

customer_reviews.title: Solid build quality and value.
customer_reviews.text: The watch winder works great. The LCD makes it super easy to use. Both my automatic watches fit nicely on them and the ability to adjust the amount of rotations per day is clutch. Build quality is good the wood is highly polished and feels substantial when you close it. Only issue is the motors are a bit loud. I have the winder on my night stand near my bed and I can definitely tell when it initially turns on, but then it disappears into background noise. Overall, a solid pick-up who doesn’t want to invest $$$ into a Wolf.
customer_reviews.author: Andrie Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: CHIYODA Dual Automatic Watch Winder. Very good value for the price.
customer_reviews.text: The unit is relatively quiet. The fit and finish are excellent. It is large enough for my largest watches. The plastic cover is crystal clear. All in all I would highly recommend this winder. Just one small gripe. The controls are very easy to use digital but they have to be reset after a power outage or if unplugged. It is so simple, not a big deal but,but I would have liked to see non volatile memory for the controls.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Excellent craftsmanship and fantastic value. Recommend highly.
customer_reviews.text: I love this winder. It looks fantastic and works perfectly. Silent operation and plenty of programmable winding options for different watch types. The finish on the cabinet is even better than expected. Solidly made, nice design and very good craftsmanship. Best winder I’ve seen at anywhere near this price point. Exceptional quality and value.
customer_reviews.author: GAB1500

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Winder at very competitive price
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and bought this based on vfm. So far so good the product arrived in excellent condition very well packaged. I have only had it a week but it keeps both of my breitling chronomats wound no problems. A fraction of the price of a Wolf winder (top of the line but hard to justify 3x price). Design makes it very easy to get watches in and out. No problem fitting a 40-50mm watch if you have one. Although well made and nicely finished a little old fashioned in appearance otherwise would give 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Parkway

customer_reviews.title: Broken control after a little over a year
customer_reviews.text: Works great when received, but after a little over a year of use, one morning when I'm ready to wear my watch, I notice the control panel is lid in a strange fashion as shown in the photo and video. Tried to redo the plugs and did not work. I did not keep the packages and papers, so not sure if this is still under warranty, and I couldn't find a way to contact Chiyoda. Please help!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy tai

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking box and gets the job done!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I gave this to each other for Christmas. He has two automatic watches, plus a vintage watch that I “stole” from him. It is difficult to set for date and time, so I am thoroughly enjoying keeping it running and ready to wear. We ar keeping it on the dresser in our bedroom and I don’t notice the sound at all. So far a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: KRWhite

customer_reviews.title: INCREDIBLE VALUE AND PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for two automatic watches. I have four other watch winders. This is by far THE BEST. The box itself is beautiful. It is Also very quiet . I can’t believe the value for the money. I am beyond pleased with this purchase. What a beautiful watch winder!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Richard M from NY

customer_reviews.title: Value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Came one day early. Only wish it had watch pillows for both men and women This is the reason for only 4 stars Wife’s watch too small and my watch too big Did some work with foam and Velcro and it fits fine now Runs so quiet can not even hear it at night
customer_reviews.author: Rono

customer_reviews.title: Very quiet and works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: It works better than I anticipated. It is very quiet. I keep it next to my bed and I can't hear it running. It keeps Rolex watches running. I am returining this for an exchange because there is a defect on finish. I thought this was hand made and QC needs an improvement. I hope the replacement is defect-free.
customer_reviews.author: ccc

customer_reviews.title: Died after 2 years
customer_reviews.text: To be fair, I did buy this in August of 2016, but I didn't expect it to die. It's not a very complicated piece of technology. Worked great until now. It was a gift for my father and he really liked it. Unplugged it to move it from one location to another. Plugged it back in. Will no longer wind. Some of the buttons on the panel are still responsive, but turning will not start no matter what I press. Left 2 stars because it still looks nice, but unfortunately it doesn't wind anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Syed

customer_reviews.title: Very good watch winder
customer_reviews.text: I've used this watch winder for about ten days since date of receival. So far it has been working flawlessly. The motors are indeed very quiet. TPD (turns per day) options fit most automatic watches. I'm using 990 bi-directional on both motors for Tissot watches. The case is beautifully finished. Excellent product for the price, assuming motors will work five or more years.
customer_reviews.author: Arvey

customer_reviews.title: Basic and does the job
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice plus it's silent and affordable. Unfortunately even on the same rotational direction and TPD settings the motors are not moving at anywhere near the same rotational speed. Highly doubt a winder at this price point actually counts the number of revolution but rather estimates based on time and ideal motor speed. I'm using it to wind 2 seiko 5's though and it gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Raffi Artinian

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, does not last.
customer_reviews.text: I found this unit to be very poor quality. After only 2 years one of the motors stopped working. I contacted the company and after much haggling they sent me a new motor. Unfortunately the unit is so poorly constructed that the old motor could not be removed because one of the screws was fused into the housing and could not be removed. The unit looks good, but it is cheaply made and will not last. I would recommend considering other units.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Very high quality IMHO for a reasonable cost.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely superb! The wood grain finish is mirror-like and the clear plastic cover is very glass-like with no noticeable distortion. Brass finish hardware very clean, smooth. Overall well fitted together. The setup is easy and the motors are very quite, you need to hold your ears to it to hear anything at all when running. Is keeping two generations of Seiko watches ready to go on a moments notice. One is a 1964 Seiko Bell-Matic and the other a current generation Seiko Kinetic. I'm extremely pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect until the power goes out, then it has to be reprogramed restarted each time.
customer_reviews.text: I'd give this 5 stars but it has one flaw. The unit shuts down and has to be reprogrammed and reset after every power outage. I couldn't figure out why my watches were not staying wound until the power went out yesterday and realized I had to reprogram and restart the winder. Now that I know this, I'm going to get a UPS battery back up but I consider this a serious design flaw for a high end product like this.
customer_reviews.author: raphael999

customer_reviews.title: Not all watches are self winding!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm....for my 65th birthday...I received my first Rolex watch. Of course, I had input on the gift and did not understand the need for this item. Watchs are self winding right ...not a Rolex...I love my Rolex and both of our Rolex's are tucked in each night. My husband's gift of the Rolex and the Chiyoda was sheer perfection.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia via RVA

customer_reviews.title: ... this too long but so far it is working great. Super quiet even with 1800 rotations per day
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had this too long but so far it is working great. Super quiet even with 1800 rotations per day. My only complaint is that it came in more colors, I'm not really a fan of the cherry wood and gold. For the price it's great. Hopefully, it is able to continue to work for a while. Update: nov. 2017: after 3 months of use one of the motors has gotten really loud but still works. I contacted the seller and they responded quickly to send me a new motor. I have downgraded from 5 to 4 stars because of the motor issue.
customer_reviews.author: N. Tucci

customer_reviews.title: Great value and beautiful winder
customer_reviews.text: 9 months in and this winder is still working very well. It produces a very low sound when working. Almost completely silent, even 9 months later. I would purchase again. Box construction is very nice as well.
customer_reviews.author: R. Bray

customer_reviews.title: I could not be more pleased
customer_reviews.text: I am just delighted with this unit. I agree with others that it came most excellently packaged; the quality is lovely, it is easy to understand and to set, and my two little Rolex watches are happily spinning around in there at their proper speed. I could not be more pleased
customer_reviews.author: J Yancey

customer_reviews.title: Dependable and quiet
customer_reviews.text: I like the touch LCD control panel to individually set each winder. Just wish there were infinitely adjustable turns-per-day rather than only the four speeds. Some of the newer Omegas call for 700 tpd, and the closest this winder can be set is 650 tpd. The quality is quite good with a beautifully lacquered wood finish.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Ackert

customer_reviews.title: Set and Forget It.
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived in a timely manner. The housing is beautiful along with simple instructions to deploy the watch winder. After several days, I'm pleased to conclude this device is wonderfully quiet and managing my timepieces as promised. I couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Cajun Man

customer_reviews.title: super
customer_reviews.text: At the beginning, I do not understand very fine the function. After understanding the functions itis super, the construction is something that is not easily found nowadays.
customer_reviews.author: pedro gomez

customer_reviews.title: Does the job for half the cost of other brand name.
customer_reviews.text: I have this for about 6 months and am satisfied with it. Easy to setup, noise level is quite low, even at night. It looks good on my night stand. Locking mechanism is not up to par with the rest of the unit and is basically useless.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Le

customer_reviews.title: Elegant finish, does the job.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, with somewhat kitschy brass keyhole. Wouldn't call it too silent, but at least the noise it makes is not too annoying. Discreet touch LCD makes it easy and understanding to set up, without the need to look into manual. Works with Seiko Kinetic series. Could have two keys in the set, instead there is only one key.
customer_reviews.author: Yuri S.

customer_reviews.title: Great double watch winder from Chiyoda
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality, extremely quite, easy to use watch winder at a good price. This unit is very attractive, easy to set up and use, and very quiet. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Useless as a watch winder.
customer_reviews.text: If it does not do what its suppose to do, then its useless to me. All this thing has to do is turn my watch and keep it going. But every time I set it put my watch on it and then lock my safe it stops working after a month. Then the watch stops working. This thing has to go in the trash its just not usable to keep my watches moving. And I cant find another use for it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does the job reliably and silent
customer_reviews.text: I bought this stuff grade from the single Watch Winder as I have added a couple more watches to my collection. Very reliable and quiet and have not had any issues
customer_reviews.author: Khellendrose

customer_reviews.title: Sort of happy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to keep 2 automatic watches running. It's quiet, but the display has quit working. I have to guess at setting the Turns per Day. Hopefully, it won't overwind my watches. It's a shame. It's quiet, and the cabinet is nice inside and out. I am past the time that the unit can be returned. That is when the display quit working.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Deibel

customer_reviews.title: GREAT QUALITY AND PERFORMANCE
customer_reviews.text: Great value. I was very surprised and pleased with the quality and workmanship of my double winder. I love the electronic touch pad for easy program settings. Well worth the price and I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ELTRAIN

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for keeping your precious timepieces safe from the elements
customer_reviews.text: This winder and case looks very classy and durable. If I were to critique this product, I would like it to have a lockdown hook similar to laptops where you can run a cable to safely secure it.
customer_reviews.author: Master_Jedi_007

customer_reviews.title: Nice product - hoping for along life.
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. I know watch winders in general have a reputation of dying, just hoping this is an exception. Quiet and efficient. A little confusing to program, there doesn't seem to be a way to have two programs that actually run at the same time. Looks fine - not something I put out anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The low rated reviews were correct. Brought this for my wife’s birthday and when she opened it the hinges on both side were broken. Also the cord did not have a tie so it appears this was sent back and Amazon did not quality control the return. It could have also come from the factory like this. Either way not good!!! Its a nice looking unit so I will try again with a replacement and amend the review after it arrives.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Chiyooda winders are great... I own 3 of them!
customer_reviews.text: This item is a beautiful work of art. I own 3 CHIYODA WATCH WINDERS. I depend on them to keep my high line automatics ready for use at all times. The customer service and support staff @ LuaLake Direct are second to none. You'll love the produce as well as this seller. I highly recommend both for the ultimate all around satisfaction.
customer_reviews.author: SCG VFG

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and quite but just wish it starts back up turning rather than manually turning back on.
customer_reviews.text: I like its compact size and build quality. Touch screen is very responsive and the motor is very quite (only had it for 2 weeks). Only thing I wish it did is to turn back on and operate after it loses power....you have to turn it back on to start TPD.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and program and a great winder for ...
customer_reviews.text: Quiet, very quiet (its on my nightstand next to bed). Easy to use and program and a great winder for the price. Keeps both my automatic Tag and Rolex keeping perfect time (can't say same for old winder). One suggestion would be to option for silver hardware as not a big fan of the brass look. Minor detail though.
customer_reviews.author: schnell

customer_reviews.title: Great watch winder- very quiet
customer_reviews.text: We expected to keep this in the closet bc of noise, but it’s super quiet. It’s about 10 feet from our bed and hasn’t disturbed us at all. Great product if you have multiple automatic watches.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Good quality watch winder
customer_reviews.text: Very nice built quality, very quiet can't even tell it was winder the watch next to my bed and I like the touch LCD switch it was so cool
customer_reviews.author: LoveToRide

customer_reviews.title: VERY POOR quality control!
customer_reviews.text: The LCD digital screen on the item that I received was completely dead! This was VERY disappointing for an item at this high of a price point, especially when it was a Christmas gift for my husband! VERY POOR quality control at the factory! I am returning this item to Amazon.com for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent workmanship
customer_reviews.text: This is a replacement for the SWI08N where the watch holder was too tight and the fit was all wrong. This new model is kore spacious and allow the watches to fit as intended and the workmanship is meticulous. Can’t even here the motor. Very Quiet
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Watch Winder!
customer_reviews.text: The case is beautiful and well constructed: I like the key to enable it to be locked.. I like the fact there is a touchscreen on/off button in the front. Unlike others where you have to toggle switches, this one is very user friendly. The cushions that hold the watch are also very flexible to accommodate larger wrists like mine. The only drawback I have is the motor is a little noisy. I have the case on my night stand by my bed and it is a little bothersome when the motor starts. Also, since the winder engages for 3 minutes, the noise continues for a long time, it seems.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Larry M. Dooley

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch winder that's reasonably priced
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made and works exactly as described. The unit does not come with operating instructions, but, it wasn't difficult to figure out. If you aren't certain if you've set it up properly you can always search online. The unit has a lock mechanism, however, it did not come with a key. I'm not worried about locking it so this isn't a big issue. You are able to hear the winder when it is running, but, it is very quiet overall. I recommend this unit to anyone that is looking for a well made, quiet watch winder that isn't too expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Better than the description
customer_reviews.text: Only had it for a week and so far so good. The cosmetic quality certainly exceeded my expectations. My only complaint is that it comes with one key, an apparently non-reproducible key. So if it is lost I'm pretty sure that I will be up the proverbial creek.
customer_reviews.author: Pak Leo

customer_reviews.title: A Beautiful Watch Winder and Display Case
customer_reviews.text: This CHIYODA Automatic Double Watch Winder with the LCD works great, is beautiful and very easy to read. It was a little confusing for my Mother to understand the directions at first but I helped her out with it and she loves it. The beautiful case with the glass top displays the watches very nicely. This was definitely a better quality than what I had expected. Beautiful and very expensive looking!
customer_reviews.author: Robin DeLu

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch Winder
customer_reviews.text: We use this daily to wind our watches. My watch used to stop everyday, due to not enough movement, (I don't wear for hours a day), it has not stopped since I started using the AWW. Also, a beautiful case.
customer_reviews.author: HarleyNana

customer_reviews.title: This looks like you set say 650 tpd and it does it ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son. It works but not what I'm use to. Mine you set for turns per day and it turns that many over the day not all at once. This looks like you set say 650 tpd and it does it all at once. So wait till end of day to to turn on. Mine keeps watch wound. I will have to look into more and report back.
customer_reviews.author: Wes

customer_reviews.title: A masterpiece
customer_reviews.text: Can’t believe shipped overnight. The box is a masterpiece and absolutely silent. It’s comparable to the Patek Philippe box the original watch came in and that’s saying something. It’s fun to watch (bad pun).
customer_reviews.author: skip levin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome watch winder
customer_reviews.text: Very nicely made very sturdy, durable, also very nice finish looks heat, great investment. The first one I bought doesn’t even compare to this one. It holds two big seiko divers watches nicely. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: dennis whitehead

customer_reviews.title: very nice watch winder
customer_reviews.text: Extremely happy with this purchase, thought about a watch winder for awhile finally chose this one and very happy with my purchase. Super quite, if I don't see it turning I would not know it works.
customer_reviews.author: Big Daddy

customer_reviews.title: Very handsome
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful and functional small piece of furniture. The digital/computer controls in such an elegant package are great value. The two individual settings allow both of my watches to stay accurate.
customer_reviews.author: SpecOps

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Watchwinder for the money.
customer_reviews.text: The first one of these that I ordered failed after two days. Seller was quick to replace it and we are now 100% satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: JayMK

customer_reviews.title: nicely finished and appears well made
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this winder is as described. It's quiet, nicely finished and appears well made. Only one thing keeps me from giving it 5 stars. If, for any reason, the winder loses electrical power it goes back to un-programmed and doesn't run. That means it stops winding the watches. I learned this the hard way. After a 5 second power blip the winder reset. I found this out several days later when I saw that both of my watches had run down and stopped. Be warned - you must re-program this winder after any power outage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The fact that my two wathes are wound when I want them in a pleasing manner
customer_reviews.text: The craftsmanship and pleasing visual appearance of the winder, as well as its reliability and quiet functionality. There is nothing that I dislike about the product.
customer_reviews.author: HENRY ALEXANDER

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice watch winder if it worked. The key and lock does not work because the key will not fit into the lock mechanism which is missing. This is the tenth time from Amazon that my first delivery has always been a used faulty order, I am about done with amazon and CHIYODA
customer_reviews.author: REGINALD FITZGERALD

customer_reviews.title: Very good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price. Quiet and looks good. Sure higher prices winders are better but three to five times as much. This will do the job and is the best at the price point.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: This is a beautiful winder well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product and not having to reset my watches all the time is great, this product looks amazing. Very well built and works great, super quiet, I would definitely by it again
customer_reviews.author: bsolomon

customer_reviews.title: Love it so far... 3.5 year update
customer_reviews.text: We'll see. Love it so far, extremely quiet and attractive.... Update 3.5 years. The product is now so noisy that it wakes me up from a light sleep. It's been getting worse and worse for about 6 months. Just reporting the truth, it has always done its job (except resets settings whenever power goes out). But now I'll just have to bite the bullet and replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Terry S

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Watch Winder!
customer_reviews.text: I've had the winder a week now nd can verify it is very very silent...next to my bed and cant hear it...all the features work as advertised. I was was a little concerned before it arrived but once I saw the unit and how well it was put together; it was work the cost. I would highly recommend this unit.
customer_reviews.author: CWO4 D

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the purchase price.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this winder on the recommendation from my brother. Never having owned a winder, I can honestly say that it exceeded my expectations. The winder itself is beautifully constructed and the motors are extremely quiet. Often times I don't even realize its working till I look over and see the watches spinning. The dual programmable feature is nice, though my OCD wins out and I just have them programmed to run at the same time. After two weeks in, I would say I am completely satisfied with this purchase. Which unfortunately means I have to admit publically that my brother was right.
customer_reviews.author: Train Writer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: This winder has it all. The craftsmanship is a 10. It works exactly as described and keeps my self winding watches ready to go. Very high quality. I definitely recommend this winder.
customer_reviews.author: Refuse1

customer_reviews.title: Great looking
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great winder for the money - Father's Day gift for my husband. Really attractive and heavy duty to wind two heavy Rolex watches.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Louise Bobo

customer_reviews.title: High quality winder.
customer_reviews.text: Not only looks great, but works great, and is very easy to set up and use. I wind two watches in a counter clockwise rotation for 980 turns daily. Silent motors are also a big plus.
customer_reviews.author: Richh

customer_reviews.title: works great very quiet
customer_reviews.text: I would have given it 5 stars, but the operating instructions a re terrible. The finish of the cabinet is outstanding and the noise level super quiet. How about a set of instructions or an online video??
customer_reviews.author: scott

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Couldnt ask for more. Works great! I wanted something that could go as low as 650 tpd for my entry level seiko movements
customer_reviews.author: Carlo

customer_reviews.title: Looks and works just as described.
customer_reviews.text: The picture didn’t do it justice. It is a very elegant looking watch winder. Very quiet. Smooth operation. Set for 650 TPD. Can see the movement of the watches. Like the digital display. Props to you CHIYODA
customer_reviews.author: rosborne54

customer_reviews.title: So far still working quietly, only minor display problem
customer_reviews.text: Keep my 2 watches working perfectly fine, one I set CCW/CW at 650 turns per day, the other CCW at 900 turns per day. I have bee using this winder for 3 months, the motors have kept running quietly. The only minor problem I found is the LCD display which dimmed at bottom part. I can still guess the settings but not so sure it will be worse than this in the future or not. Overall, I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: VaroonV

customer_reviews.title: Very very nice product
customer_reviews.text: So far, 1 month now, this winder is quiet, and works very nicely. Size, quality and style appear almost too good for the $79 price tag. We'll see how things go...
customer_reviews.author: F. Terkoski

customer_reviews.title: Very quiet
customer_reviews.text: We are using this for both of our watches; mine has a smaller band and it seems like the pillow is really pushing against the band, it's hard to get on. I wish you could select the pillow size, otherwise we love this winder! So quiet! Has multiple settings and you can set each watch to run on it's own setting.
customer_reviews.author: Deb in Phx

customer_reviews.title: It is nearly silent when running and looks amazing. I would not hesitate to order it again ...
customer_reviews.text: The instructions take a little getting used to but this piece is furniture quality. It is nearly silent when running and looks amazing. I would not hesitate to order it again and only wished they made one that held and wound more watches. Great investment for those who prize their automatic time pieces.
customer_reviews.author: M. J. Strybel

customer_reviews.title: Worked for a while, until it didn't
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this winder in 2016, and do not use it much. It worked well for me. Settings were simple and easy to use, but I plugged it in recently and the LCD screen doesn't work at all. The motors are running erratically, but it is of no use, since I cannot control them. I wouldn't buy again. These are supposed to last much longer.
customer_reviews.author: fenomeno

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and easy use
customer_reviews.text: This watch winder is well worth the money. The digital display is easy to read and functions very well. Very quiet and keeps the watches rotated correctly to keep accurate time.
customer_reviews.author: Train

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what was advertised
customer_reviews.text: Well crafted, very low noise and beautiful looking. Only had it for a week, so can’t comment on longevity.
customer_reviews.author: Zippy

customer_reviews.title: Nice Watch Winder
customer_reviews.text: I've had it for about 2 1/2 weeks and it's been working well so far. The LCD Touch Control is very nice and easy to use. Very quiet and appears to be made really well. Using it for my wife's Omega Ladymatic watch and my IWC
customer_reviews.author: PBRN

customer_reviews.title: Nice setup but SUPER LOUD motors!!!
customer_reviews.text: Decent looking box, and I like the dual settings for different watches, but the motors are NOT QUIET. The 1st day of use the motor seemed pretty quiet sitting 3 feet from my bed...but now after 2 weeks of use, I can hear it every time it's on and it sometimes keeps me awake. Maybe I got a defective one?
customer_reviews.author: IcePick06

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and operates well
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Previously I had a single bit had need for a double. Very pleased with the product and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Look good and seems to be good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Have had this for some time now and it works great. Easy to use and programmable.
customer_reviews.author: Kyong Tupper

customer_reviews.title: Right out of the box it's a nice piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the box it's a nice piece of furniture. If you're looking to display as well as wind, this Piece looks great by itself, even better with my watches in it. The instructions need work but that's nearly a universal statement. Nothing at all was loose in this unit. Will update with issues or durability if it warrants.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm...!
customer_reviews.text: Soundless working product. My mechanical watches are wounded up nicely
customer_reviews.author: EDGAR ARANA CASTRO

customer_reviews.title: Well made watch winder
customer_reviews.text: Well made and fairly operationally quiet. Innovative LED cycle time indicator located inside unit. I've had the unit for 2 months now and no problems. Comes with an 18 month warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Plater

customer_reviews.title: watch winder
customer_reviews.text: I like that I can fit my ladies watch onto the pillows. It is very quiet and it looks nice
customer_reviews.author: Ann Travis

customer_reviews.title: Instructions could be clearer
customer_reviews.text: The instructions on how to use it could be clear er. Also, you have to wind the watch before the automatic Winder works? It is quiet but I’ve had the watches stop and not wind. I will be calling the company to see what I am doing wrong
customer_reviews.author: Quaildog

customer_reviews.title: The finish is beautiful, but
customer_reviews.text: The finish is beautiful, but ,what I hate about this thing, is, it never really worked. I program the thing and it works for one set and it turns off and never ever spins again until I turn it back on again and reprogram it, then, it turns off again and never turns again.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher L Carrier

customer_reviews.title: luxury
customer_reviews.text: Very fine craftsman ship luxury at it best with out the high cost of it.very quiet
customer_reviews.author: latino

product_meta.title: CHIYODA Double Watch Winder LCD with Touch Panel and Display Screen for Automatic Watches Two Quiet Mabuchi Motors 12 Available Modes(Brown)
product_meta.description:
PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Package Dimensions :11.2 x 8.95 x 7.6 inches; 5.63 Pounds
 * Item model number :CYD-SWI22
 * Department :Unisex-adult
 * Date First Available :January 15, 2016
 * Manufacturer :CHIYODA
 * ASIN :B01ANOQ3AS

 * .zg_hrsr_item {list-style : none};
 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #55,494 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry)  *  #8 inWatch Winders 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.5 out of 5 stars689 ratings
feature_bullets: 【Convenient LCD Touch Panel & Display Screen】a very simple and clear LCD screen control the device precisely and smartly with backlight. You can set the rotation and know its current status easily even in the dark.
【Noise-Isolating Dual Quiet Motor】MABUCHI belt driven motor system which is extremely quiet and long lasting use, winds two watches individually.

【Independent Motor to Each Watch for Better Work】The motors are working separately with different direction (clockwise, counterclockwise, or bi-directional) & TPD mode, which provides a more professional, precise and customized winding for each watch inside. Specially designed for those delicate and heavy watches, and keep them a silent and smooth running without overloading.

【12 Modes Available For choose】4 TPDs - Turns Per Day ( 650-990-1300-2000 TPD and 3 kinds of directions (clockwise, counterclockwise, both) can be separately set, which make this product have 12 Modes available for setting, can be suitable for almost all watches in market . Each TPD has same rotation speed but different interval time. It turns at regular intervals to keep the automatic wound and accurate when not on the wrist.

【What You Will Get】Size: 9.8*7.3*6.3 inches. Package: 1*watch winder, 2*foam cushion, 1*manual, 1*wiping cloth, 1*AC adapter(No battery packaged), 1* Warranty card. 18 months Warranty and Technical service.
